snippet: When the earthquake and tsunami hit Japan last March, Hiroko Masuike was following the story as a photo producer for The New York Times. That wasn't enough. Two weeks later, she was in Japan, photographing the destruction.
abstract: When the earthquake and tsunami hit Japan last March, Hiroko Masuike was following the story as a photo producer for The New York Times. That wasn't enough. Two weeks later, she was in Japan, photographing the destruction.
